channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: National Rent Control, Falling Mortgage Rates, and Fleeing Homebuyers
item.description: A new nationwide rent control proposal could cap rent increases for any landlord with a certain amount of properties. But will it actually pass? How would landlords survive when rents […]

item.title: Uber, Lyft, DoorDash can continue to classify drivers as contractors in California
item.description: The California Supreme Court ruled Thursday that Proposition 22 – the ballot measure that passed in November 2020 and classified app-based gig workers as independent contractors rather than employees – is here to stay. The decision is a win for app-based companies like Uber, Lyft, DoorDash and Instacart, which have fought hard to maintain their […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Photos: Three Years of a Family’s Grief and Healing After a Fatal Police Shooting
item.description: Photographer Michael Indriolo documents an East Cleveland family’s search for peace after the 2021 police shooting of their 19-year-old brother.

item.title: 12 Cities You’ll Regret You Didn’t Invest In 10 Years From Now
item.description: Now that the pandemic boom is over, it's time to scope out the next set of markets gearing up for a boom.

item.title: Alphabet pours $5B into Waymo, Cruise scraps the Origin and Elon’s bet on autonomy
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation. Sign up here for free — just click TechCrunch Mobility! I don’t know about you, but for me, the past few days have offered up even more evidence that our world is vulnerable to software bugs. Yep, […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Sending Unarmed Responders Instead of Police: What We’ve Learned
item.description: There are more than 100 response teams nationwide, but experts say more research on their impact is needed.

item.title: Investors Made a Record Share of Home Purchases in Q1
item.description: Investor buyers accounted for 14.8% of home sales in the first quarter of 2024—the highest share on record.

item.title: Archera helps customers access deep cloud discounts
item.description: In addition to insured commitments, Archera provides consulting services to help build purchasing strategies for customers to optimize their cloud usage. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Marshall Project Launches Investigate This!
item.description: Our toolkits will offer data, storytelling and engagement resources to empower more criminal justice reporting in local communities

item.title: Foreign Investment Curbed by Proposed Housing Rule, But It Comes With Potential Consequences for American Investors
item.description: The Treasury Department's proposed rule would make it harder for foreign investors to purchase land near military installations, adding to a 2018 law. The cascading effects could also impact Americans.

item.title: Google makes its Gemini chatbot faster and more widely available
item.description: In its bid to maintain pace with generative AI rivals like Anthropic and OpenAI, Google is rolling out updates to the no-fee tier of Gemini, its AI-powered chatbot. The updates are focused on making the platform more performant — and more widely available. Starting Thursday, Gemini 1.5 Flash — a lightweight multimodal model Google announced […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How to Investigate the Trend of Declining Prison Staff and Deteriorating Conditions Behind Bars
item.description: Our toolkit helps you report on how this employment crisis impacts safety and local budgets in your state.

item.title: Why Long-term Rental Properties Aren’t as Great as They’re Hyped Up to Be
item.description: Long-term rentals may disappoint if you don't consider three key factors: long-term rent growth, appreciation, and the tenant segment the property attracts.

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: Meta’s new ‘Imagine me’ feature lets you generate AI selfies
item.description: Meta’s AI integrations into apps like Instagram and Facebook have felt pretty useless so far. If I’m just trying to find my friend’s Instagram, why do I have to navigate around a Meta AI interface that is desperately trying to tell me the top five vegetarian protein sources? But with the release of Meta’s new […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How to Investigate COVID’s Deadly Toll in Your State Prisons
item.description: Our toolkit helps you report on deadly systemic failures and analyze the pandemic as a case study of how facilities can prepare for the next crisis.
